cells.data:
0. SYNC WITH GitHub to be sure you have the latest versions of file(s) you are going to edit!!!

1. Add site navigation to doc
     -Open navigation-template.html
     -Save with appropriate name in appropriate folder (such as /BCL-Content/docs/en/video-cloud/android-sdk/sample-code/android-sdk-video-data.html)
     -Insert title of doc in lines 7 and 71
     -Paste content after the <!-- content starts here --> comment
     -Add an </div> just above the first <concept>
          -If there are no <concepts>, add an </div> just above the final TWO </div>s above the bcl scripts near the bottom of the page
     -Surround each concept with a <div>
          -Use the following code for the opening <div>
<div id="conceptname" class="section">
  <h2><a name="conceptname"></a>Concept Title (less than 21 characters)</h2>
</div>
        -Change the conceptname and Concept Title
        -Don't forget to place the corresponding </div> just before the start of the next <concept>, OR near the end of the doc just above the final TWO <divs>s

2. Edit the navigation
     -Open the corresponding file to add/edit the navigation from this folder /git/BCL-Contnet/docs/en/grunt/source
     -Add an Item[] consisting of url and name in the appropriate location; alphabetize your entry
     -In Terminal, cd to the folder /git/BCL-Contnet/docs/en/grunt
     -Type grunt at the command line and be sure no errors are reported
    
3. Post to CONTENT github repository

4. Ask Robert to work his magic
